QuestData.Title: The Halls of the Dead
QuestData.Description: <In front of you, the bare earth slopes down towards the dark entrance to the crypts.>$B$B<You can feel the tug of the lightforged artifact urging you towards it. Perhaps the other piece is down there?>
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Lightforged Arch within the Dawning Woods Catacombs.
QuestData.RewardText: <In the dirt of this alcove, your eye catches the shine of brilliant metal. You've found another piece of the artifact!>
